name: NCAA Tournament 2025 Predictions
situation: The 2025 NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament starts tomorrow. We want to make predictions for the matchups in the first round (Round of 64) of the tournament. Each matchup features two teams with different seeds, playing strengths, and histories.
task: For each specific matchup, predict the probability that the first team listed (Team 1) will win against the second team (Team 2), based on their season performance, player statistics, injuries, and other relevant factors.

input_data_model.name: matchup_description
input_data_model.description: A brief description of the matchup including the team names, seeds, and when they play

input_data_model.name: team_1_name
input_data_model.description: The name of the first team in the matchup

input_data_model.name: team_1_seed
input_data_model.description: The seed number of the first team

input_data_model.name: team_2_name
input_data_model.description: The name of the second team in the matchup

input_data_model.name: team_2_seed
input_data_model.description: The seed number of the second team

input_data_model.name: team_1_schedule
input_data_model.description: The season schedule with results for team 1

input_data_model.name: team_2_schedule
input_data_model.description: The season schedule with results for team 2

input_data_model.name: kenpom_matchup_all_games
input_data_model.description: KenPom comparison of the teams for all games played

input_data_model.name: kenpom_matchup_conference
input_data_model.description: KenPom comparison of the teams for conference games only

input_data_model.name: injury_report
input_data_model.description: Information about player injuries that could impact the game

input_data_model.name: additional_context
input_data_model.description: Any additional information or context about the matchup

input_data_model.name: additional_images
input_data_model.description: Any additional relevant images for analysis
